items.summary: Remove all Internet Identity authentication logic from the Admin Panel page (frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx), including all useInternetIdentity hook imports, Internet Identity login UI components, authentication checks, and any code that depends on Internet Identity authentication state.

Implement a simple username and password login form on the Admin Panel page with two text input fields labeled 'Username' and 'Password', a 'Login' submit button, and styling consistent with the site's dark theme and neon accent colors.

Implement admin authentication logic in the Admin Panel page that verifies the submitted username is exactly 'admin' and the password is exactly 'habibur123', stores the authenticated session state in sessionStorage, and displays the user management interface only when authenticated.

Update the getAllUsers query hook in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts to call the backend getAllUsers method using the backend actor without requiring any Internet Identity authentication, handle the response data correctly, and display meaningful error messages with full error details if the call fails.

Update the AdminPanelPage component (frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx) to trigger the getAllUsers query immediately after successful admin login using the simple username/password authentication, display a clear loading state while fetching, show the full error message if the fetch fails, and render the UserListTable component with the fetched user data when successful.

Verify that the UserListTable component (frontend/src/components/admin/UserListTable.tsx) displays an 'Approve' button next to each user with status='Pending', and wire the button click to call the backend approveUser function without requiring Internet Identity authentication, refresh the user list on success, and display a success toast message.

Remove or disable any Internet Identity authentication initialization from frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts that might interfere with admin panel operations, ensuring the backend actor can be created and used without requiring Internet Identity login.
